visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a 3D column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: '3D Column Chart Example', Axes and labels styling: X-axis grid lines with width 1, Y-axis labels with font size 12px and color #333, Data series: One series with data [-1, 3, -3, -2, 1, 0], Custom colors: Negative values in red (#DD0000), Additional configurations: 3D options enabled with alpha 15, beta 15, and depth 50, chart margins set to 75.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a 3D column chart with specific settings. The chart type is set to 'column', and it includes 3D options enabled with an alpha of 15, beta of 15, and depth of 50. The chart title is '3D Column Chart Example'. The X-axis has grid lines with a width of 1, and the Y-axis labels are styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333. The data series includes one series with the data [-1, 3, -3, -2, 1, 0], and negative values are colored red (#DD0000). The chart also has a margin of 75 to provide spacing around the chart area.
